attributes.action: allow everyone to obtain the same minimum wage,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am 16 years old and i get payed £3.40 an hour, my work friends get payed £5.50 an hour why we both do the same job its not fair. We should all be treat equal. We want equality in the UK. Also when young one get payed so little we actually do more work because they pay us less.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/minwage16/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
